user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I want to create a unique invitation card. Can you provide me with some creative card designs and templates? Also, I need a list of free games that I can include as party favors. And, by the way, can you check the stats of my friend's World of Tanks account to see how skilled he is?

TaskList.description: Research creative invitation card designs and templates for birthday parties.
Compile a list of free games that can be included as party favors.
Fetch the statistics of the user's friend's World of Tanks account.
Integrate the gathered invitation designs and free game list into the final party plan.
